T02TD3079E:175b-1: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya raksha s'a dha nam /
T02TD3079E:175b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3079E:175b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dri ma med pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3079E:175b-6: gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa'i //
T02TD3079E:175b-7: bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la ni //
T02TD3079E:175b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD3079E:175b-10: rgyal sras thu bo rnams la yang //
T02TD3079E:175b-11: dngos kun phyag byas 'od zer gyi //
T02TD3079E:175b-12: dri med snying po sgrub thabs bshad //
T02TD3079E:175b-13: bkra shis yid 'ong bde gnas su //
T02TD3079E:175b-14: khrus byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02TD3079E:175b-15: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
T02TD3079E:175b-16: sngom bzung tshad med bzhi la gnas //
T02TD3079E:175b-17: rang snying aa las 'od byung bas //
T02TD3079E:175b-18: bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems //
T02TD3079E:175b-19: nam mkha'i ngos la bsam par bya //
T02TD3079E:175b-20: phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02TD3079E:175b-21: de nas stong pa'i ngo bor bsam //
T02TD3079E:175b-22: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham /
T02TD3079E:175b-23: de nas las rjes dran par bya //
T02TD3079E:175b-24: aa las zla ba rdo rjer bskyed //
T02TD3079E:175b-25: de yis ji ltar 'dod rgyal pos //
T02TD3079E:175b-26: bgegs rnams bskrad par byas nas ni //
T02TD3079E:175b-27: de dbus nam mkha' gru gsum zlu //
T02TD3079E:175b-28: gru bzhi ri rab rnam par bsam ;
T02TD3079E:175b-29: / gru bzhi sgo dang rab ldan pa //
T02TD3079E:175b-30: 'od dang ldan pa'i khang par bsgom //
T02TD3079E:175b-31: lte bar padma zla ba la //
T02TD3079E:175b-32: aa dang mam mu hri: h'um las //
T02TD3079E:175b-33: aa las nor bu 'bar bar gyur //
T02TD3079E:175b-34: sku mdog sna tshogs ma nges la //
T02TD3079E:175b-35: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang ldan //
T02TD3079E:175b-36: g-yas pa skyabs sbyin g-yon nor bu ;
T02TD3079E:175b-37: / mtshan dang dpe byad tshogs pa dbus //
T02TD3079E:175b-38: g-yas su 'jam dpal rnon po la //
T02TD3079E:175b-39: rgyab tu sh'akya thub pa nyid //
T02TD3079E:175b-40: g-yon du seng ge sgra bsam bya //
T02TD3079E:175b-41: mdun du phyag na rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD3079E:175b-42: mdun gyi nam mkhar ye shes bsam //
T02TD3079E:175b-43: byin brlabs dbang bskur bsam par bya //
T02TD3079E:176a-2: rtse gcig yid kyis bsgom par bya //
T02TD3079E:176a-3: de las skyo na snying po bzlas //
T02TD3079E:176a-4: gtsug tu bzlas dang smin phrag bzlas //
T02TD3079E:176a-5: snying ga nyid du bzlas pa'o //
T02TD3079E:176a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mu dra aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
T02TD3079E:176a-8: de nas gtor mas mchod nas gshegs ;
T02TD3079E:176a-9: / bdag nyid smon lam nyid bya zhing //
T02TD3079E:176a-10: snang ba sgyu ma bzhin du sbyang //
T02TD3079E:176a-11: 'di byas ngal ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD3079E:176a-12: 'di byas ngal ba sdig pa dag / dri med 'khor lo'i skur gyur shog / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam kar shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3079E:176a-15: bod kyi lo ts'a ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
